portfolio.title: Funexch
portfolio.descr: A complex B2B, and B2C platform for sport and casino betting targeted for the Indian and Hong Kong markets. The client, a startup in the online betting industry, approached our development team with the vision of creating a betting platform that would offer users a wide range of sports events, real-time odds, secure payment options, and a user-friendly interface. The project required a robust, scalable, and responsive application to cater to a diverse audience of sports enthusiasts.

portfolio.title: Funexch Mobile
portfolio.descr: A startup in the online betting industry enlisted our development team to create a cutting-edge mobile application catering to the Indian and Hong Kong markets. This app is designed to provide users with a comprehensive platform for sports and casino betting, offering a vast array of events, real-time odds updates, secure payment methods, and an intuitive user interface.

portfolio.title: Shootmode
portfolio.descr: It`s an Australian e-commerce platform tailored for photography and videography enthusiasts where users can effortlessly rent cameras, video cameras, and a wide array of equipment. This project aims to revolutionize the way individuals access high-quality gear for their creative endeavors. With a user-friendly interface and secure payment options, this platform ensures a seamless rental experience. Whether the user a hobbyist, professional, or simply curious, this website provides convenient access to top-of-the-line equipment.

portfolio.descr: A Dutch startup with a charitable mission! Our project is dedicated to supporting and advancing charitable initiatives. We raise funds and bring attention to socially significant issues, fostering positive change in the world. Join our community and help us make the world a better place for all!

portfolio.title: Aws-Audit
portfolio.descr: The Amazon AWS Audit Dashboard website provides a centralized platform for monitoring and analyzing security events within AWS, enabling administrators to track user activities, resource changes, and potential risks in real-time.
